sentences.sContent: Women commit fewer crimes than men.
He has clearly committed his government to continuing down the path of economic reform.
sentences.sCn: 他明确地作出保证，他的政府会继续在经济改革的道路上走下去。

sentences.sContent: ...she knew she had to make a bold move to fully commit to her new future...
...Before she ever gets the chance to commit to a cause...

synos.tran: 犯罪，做错事；把...交托给；指派…作战；使…承担义务

remMethod.val: com(共同) ＋ mit(送出) → 一起送出 → 把…托付给

words.tran: 坚定的；效忠的；承担义务的
承诺，保证；委托；承担义务；献身

trans.tranOther: to do something wrong or illegal
